author: Napier Lopez
title: WhatsApp teams up with the WHO to release 21 new stickers about quarantine life
description: The coronavirus pandemic may mean that we won’t get any new emoji until 2022, but stickers a thing people use, right? To acknowledge the reality of our new stay-at-home lives, WhatsApp partnered with the World Health Organization to create 21 stickers you can…
